duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all the daily functions of assigned lounge(s) and direct resources.
Drive continuous operations improvement and achieve high customer service satisfaction.
Achieve the financial goals of the airline and HMSHost.
Create constant clarity in communicating goals, assignments, focuses, and key messages.
Demonstrate a can-do attitude toward activating on business objectives and involve the team to make things happen.
Demonstrate team management, delegation, and issue resolution skills.
Demonstrate knowledge of HMSHost policies, product, service, quality, equipment, and operations standards.
Speak, read, comprehend instructions, short correspondence, and policy documents.
Understand menus and brand standards as well as converse comfortably with individuals.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from a Food Service Management or Culinary program may substitute for a portion of the time-based experience required for each of these roles.
